name: Through the Lens (nailuj05)
description:
A puzzle game, set around a magical spyglass. Reveal hidden secrets to solve interesting puzzels. Escape the dark tower you waked up in.

Overcome lasers, lights and locks, reveal secret runes and escape the tower!

Developed by a team of 3 in 72 hours.

Build for SteamVR (PCVR)
